name: Touhou Silver Night Festival ~ Freedom Train
name_original: Touhou Silver Night Festival ~ Freedom Train
description:
"Silver Night Festival" is a bullet-hell action game set in a fantasy land.
This is a bullet-action game where you ride a unique train and aim to achieve your goals!

Collect money by shooting down incoming enemies and purchase items to strengthen your character.

In each stage, a randomly changing boss awaits you!
